name: SVEJO No Ads
description: Annoying ads on bulgarian social website svejo.net. No ads, and footer removed. Now it is more minimalistic.
additional_info:
Version 0.1 - Main top banner removed, Right banner removed, Footer removed in order to get site more minimalistic.
Version 0.2 - Remove in shared link ads.
Version 0.3 - Remove annoying wheather widget.
Version 0.4 - Update some ad issues.
